report.title: UKBMS Section Level Download Report
report.description: An occurrence list with a count attribute to be used as the UKBMS Section Level Download Report, with filters for Indicia user, date start and end, location.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM samples parent JOIN samples s ON s.parent_id=parent.id AND s.deleted=false JOIN locations l ON parent.location_id=l.id JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt ON ctt.id=l.location_type_id JOIN locations l2 ON s.location_id=l2.id JOIN occurrences o ON o.sample_id=s.id AND o.deleted=false JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl ON cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id AND (CAST(cttl.taxon_list_id AS character varying)='#taxon_list_id#' OR '#taxon_list_id#' = '') LEFT JOIN (sample_attributes sa JOIN sample_attribute_values sav ON sav.sample_attribute_id = sa.id AND sav.deleted = false) ON sa.caption = 'Recorder Name' AND sa.deleted = false AND sav.sample_id = parent.id #joins# WHERE parent.deleted = false AND #website_filter# #filters# AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) #order_by#
report.field_sql: o.id as occurrence_id, parent.id as sample_id, ctt.term as site_type, l.name as site_name, l.code as site_code, s.id as subsample_id, CASE l2.centroid_sref_system -- what OSGB 2letter, 6 digits WHEN '4326' THEN CASE l.centroid_sref_system -- what OSGB 2letter, 6 digits WHEN 'OSGB' THEN CASE (CAST(st_x(st_transform(l2.centroid_geom,27700)) AS INTEGER)/500000)*10 + (CAST(st_y(st_transform(l2.centroid_geom,27700)) AS INTEGER)/500000) WHEN 0 THEN 'S' WHEN 1 THEN 'N' WHEN 10 THEN 'T' WHEN 11 THEN 'O' ELSE 'H' END || CASE (mod(CAST(st_x(st_transform(l2.centroid_geom,27700)) AS INTEGER),500000)/100000)*10 + mod(CAST(st_y(st_transform(l2.centroid_geom,27700)) AS INTEGER),500000)/100000 WHEN 0 THEN 'V' WHEN 1 THEN 'Q' WHEN 2 THEN 'L' WHEN 3 THEN 'F' WHEN 4 THEN 'A' WHEN 10 THEN 'W' WHEN 11 THEN 'R' WHEN 12 THEN 'M' WHEN 13 THEN 'G' WHEN 14 THEN 'B' WHEN 20 THEN 'X' WHEN 21 THEN 'S' WHEN 22 THEN 'N' WHEN 23 THEN 'H' WHEN 24 THEN 'C' WHEN 30 THEN 'Y' WHEN 31 THEN 'T' WHEN 32 THEN 'O' WHEN 33 THEN 'J' WHEN 34 THEN 'D' WHEN 40 THEN 'Z' WHEN 41 THEN 'U' WHEN 42 THEN 'P' WHEN 43 THEN 'K' WHEN 44 THEN 'E' ELSE '-' END || lpad(''||mod(CAST(st_x(st_transform(l2.centroid_geom,27700)) AS INTEGER), 100000)/100,3,'0') || lpad(''||mod(CAST(st_y(st_transform(l2.centroid_geom,27700)) AS INTEGER), 100000)/100,3,'0') WHEN 'OSIE' THEN st_astext(st_transform(l2.centroid_geom,29903)) || CASE (mod(CAST(st_x(st_transform(l2.centroid_geom,29903)) AS INTEGER),500000)/100000)*10 + mod(CAST(st_y(st_transform(l2.centroid_geom,29903)) AS INTEGER),500000)/100000 WHEN 0 THEN 'V' WHEN 1 THEN 'Q' WHEN 2 THEN 'L' WHEN 3 THEN 'F' WHEN 4 THEN 'A' WHEN 10 THEN 'W' WHEN 11 THEN 'R' WHEN 12 THEN 'M' WHEN 13 THEN 'G' WHEN 14 THEN 'B' WHEN 20 THEN 'X' WHEN 21 THEN 'S' WHEN 22 THEN 'N' WHEN 23 THEN 'H' WHEN 24 THEN 'C' WHEN 30 THEN 'Y' WHEN 31 THEN 'T' WHEN 32 THEN 'O' WHEN 33 THEN 'J' WHEN 34 THEN 'D' WHEN 40 THEN 'Z' WHEN 41 THEN 'U' WHEN 42 THEN 'P' WHEN 43 THEN 'K' WHEN 44 THEN 'E' ELSE '-' END || lpad(''||mod(CAST(st_x(st_transform(l2.centroid_geom,29903)) AS INTEGER), 100000)/100,3,'0') || lpad(''||mod(CAST(st_y(st_transform(l2.centroid_geom,29903)) AS INTEGER), 100000)/100,3,'0') ELSE l2.centroid_sref END ELSE l2.centroid_sref END as sref, l2.code as section_name, '' as date, --- allows proper positioning of date column in report parent.date_start, parent.date_end, parent.date_type, sav.text_value as recorder, cttl.taxon_meaning_id, cttl.preferred_taxon as taxon, coalesce(cttl.default_common_name, cttl.preferred_taxon) as common

order_bys.order_by: l.name, section_name, parent.date_start, cttl.taxonomic_sort_order, o.id DESC
